description: The project is for the renovation of the building envelope of M55 at 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario. The work is expected to be completed within 78 weeks after contract award. Bids must be submitted by March 7th, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST.

# M55 Building Envelope Renewal Tender - Solicitation WS4042461120

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Reference Number:** WS4042461120
* **Proviment Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Publication Date:** February 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 7, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST (Note: See Amendment to Closing Time for details)

## Project Overview

This building envelope renovation project aims to provide construction services to renovate Building M55 located at 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario. The project requires a completion time of seventy-eight (78) weeks after contract award.

## Supporting Documentation and Bid Submission

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 7, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST.
* Any bids submitted after 2:00 p.m. EST will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact and Communication

* For all bid-related inquiries and communications, please use the "Event Messages" tab within CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) to reach the Contracting Authority.

## Trade Agreements

* This solicitation falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* This project is in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Cody Larocque (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** cody.larocque@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18692184?extsite=MTg2OTIxODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Note

* Please disregard any Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.
